Package de.nec.nle.siafu.model

This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Trackable
    An interface for objects that can be tracked on the simulation, that is, objects that have a position and can be marked with a Marker.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    Instances of the Agent class represent the simulations Agents.
    BinaryOverlay
    A binary overlay returns a BooleanType object (a publishable boolean) set to true or false depending on whether the value at a given postion is above or below a unique threshold.
    CoordinateTools
    Siafu's concept of space is actually discrete.
    DirectorySimulationData
    There is one instance of this class per run of Siafu.
    DiscreteOverlay
    A discrete overlay returns it's value as a Text object according to the provided thresholds.
    Gradient
    This class is used to generate and query the distance gradients that help the Siafu Agents to navigate.
    JarSimulationData
    There is one instance of this class per run of Siafu.
    Overlay
    An overlay is in essence a matrix which maps a value to each position of the simulated world.
    Place
    Places define a position in the simulated world.
    Position
    This class represents a position in the simulator map.
    RealOverlay
    A real overlay does not perform any mapping between the matrix values and the returned value.
    SimulationData
    The subclasses of SimulationData encapsulate the simulation information, including the agent, world and context models, the configuration file, the image maps and the sprites.
    World
    This class represents the world being simulated.

Package de.nec.nle.siafu.model Description

This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects. Yes, it heavily overlaps with the types package.
